text.__SUMMARY__:
Berberis hsuyunensis is a species of flowering plant in the family Berberidaceae, first described in 1974. It is endemic to Sichuan Province in China.Berberis hsuyunensis is a shrub up to 2 m tall. Leaves are evergreen, simple, elliptical. Inflorescence is a large fascicle of 30-50 flowers. Berries are spherical, black.
